Events and trends
* 1126 BCâThymoetes, legendary King of Athens, dies childless after a reign of 8
  years. He is succeeded by his designated heir Melanthus of Pylos, a fifth-
  generation descendant of Neleus who had reportedly assisted him in battle
  against the Boeotians.
